channel.title: [Deathlypvpz] Moving the construction portal
channel.description: So i'm useing deathlypvpz as a base, and i want to move the tele portal at home that teles you to the construction place from its current place to varrock, and when i move the portal, it acts weird..... It doesnt work.... What do i have to change, the public private value doesnt appear anymore :/ help asap!

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Moving the construction portal
item.dc:creator: @Danielson183 Danielson183
item.description:
@Danielson183 wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:534886”][quote author=Danielson183 link=topic=653687.msg4379447#msg4379447 date=1383079824]
So i’m useing deathlypvpz as a base, and i want to move the tele portal at home that teles you to the construction place from its current place to varrock, and when i move the portal, it acts weird… It doesnt work…
What do i have to change, the public private value doesnt appear anymore
help asap!
[/quote]

ObjectHandler.java

Click the item as an Admin it should tell you the item ID, search the ItemID in ObjectHandler.java then find the coords you want either ::dataon or ::mypos

If this does not help then reply and ill offer some more troubleshooting options[/quote]
I got it to work, found out how to skin a cat.

Read full topic

item.title: [Deathlypvpz] Moving the construction portal
item.dc:creator: @Kozs Kozs
item.description:
@Kozs wrote:

[quote=“Danielson183, post:1, topic:534886”]So i’m useing deathlypvpz as a base, and i want to move the tele portal at home that teles you to the construction place from its current place to varrock, and when i move the portal, it acts weird… It doesnt work…
What do i have to change, the public private value doesnt appear anymore
help asap![/quote]

ObjectHandler.java

Click the item as an Admin it should tell you the item ID, search the ItemID in ObjectHandler.java then find the coords you want either ::dataon or ::mypos

If this does not help then reply and ill offer some more troubleshooting options

Read full topic
